definition: generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb

sentences.english: There's really no point in arguing about pinpoints.
sentences.chinese: 爲芝麻綠豆般的小事爭論實在毫無意義。

sentences.english: Really , a lot of sesame green beans are so.
sentences.chinese: 真的，有好多好多的芝麻綠豆都是如此。

definition: lit. not even the chickens and dogs are left undisturbed (idiom)/fig. great commotion/pandemonium
to make a fool of oneself
lit. neither a relative nor a friend (idiom)/fig. unrelated to one another in any way
to refute/to demolish (an argument, theory etc)
the rice is cooked/what's done is done/it's too late to change anything now (idiom)
pinyin: sheng1 mi3 zhu3 cheng2 shu2 fan4

definition: lit. small belly, chicken's gut (idiom); narrow-minded/petty
to let emotions affect one's decisions
lit. to kill the chicken to get the eggs (idiom)/fig. to kill the goose that lays the golden eggs
variant of 定親|定亲[ding4 qin1]
